name: Tantō Tactics
description:
Command your tiny samurai in this micro strategy game. With spear, bow, and sword lead your army to victory! 

Controls:
  • Mouse
    • Left click to select/move/attack unit.
    • X to end turn.
  • Controller
    • Arrow keys to move cursor.
    • Z/C to select/move/attack unit.
    • X to end turn.
  • To enable/disable mouse controls:
    • Hit enter to show pause menu
    • Navigate with arrow keys to "Enable Mouse" and press Z to confirm.
